thread.title: Police search for suspect who shot pregnant woman
thread.title_full: Police search for suspect who shot pregnant woman - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Posted by WAFB Staff
title: Police search for suspect who shot pregnant woman
text:
BATON ROUGE, LA (WAFB) - Police are searching for the person responsible for shooting a pregnant woman in the stomach Thursday night.
According to the Baton Rouge Police Department, the shooting happened on Arbor Vitae Drive, which is near Airline Highway and McClelland Drive, around 10:30 p.m.
Officials said the victim was taken to the hospital and was last listed in stable condition. Her unborn child, however, is reportedly in critical condition.
Investigators have not yet identified a suspect for this case.
Anyone with information about the shooting is strongly encouraged to call Crime Stoppers at 344-7867.
